trans-unit.source: This app hasn't been verified by SugarCRM admin yet and confirmed it's authentic.
trans-unit.target: This app hasn't been verified by SugarCRM admin yet and confirmed it's authentic.

trans-unit.source: Unverified apps may pose a threat to your personal data.
trans-unit.target: Unverified apps may pose a threat to your personal data.

trans-unit.source: "%client%" is requesting access to use your Sugar account to:
trans-unit.target: "%client%" is requesting access to use your Sugar account to:

trans-unit.source: Do you want to allow this access?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to allow this access?

trans-unit.source: Sorry, service is not able to process the request.
trans-unit.target: Sorry, service is not able to process the request.

trans-unit.source: Can't log in? Forget your password?
trans-unit.target: Can't log in? Forget your password?

trans-unit.source: Enter your user name below and we'll send you password reset instructions.
trans-unit.target: Enter your user name below and we'll send you password reset instructions.

trans-unit.source: Please choose a new password to finish log in.
trans-unit.target: Please choose a new password to finish log in.

trans-unit.source: Read some tips on %link%creating a secure password.%endlink%
trans-unit.target: Read some tips on %link%creating a secure password.%endlink%

trans-unit.source: Awesome, you've successfully updated your password.
trans-unit.target: Awesome, you've successfully updated your password.

trans-unit.source: Now you can log in and check if %link%your profile%endlink% is correct.
trans-unit.target: Now you can log in and check if %link%your profile%endlink% is correct.

trans-unit.source: An email has been sent to following address %emailaddress%.
trans-unit.target: An email has been sent to following address %emailaddress%.

trans-unit.source: Follow the direction in the email to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Follow the direction in the email to reset your password.

trans-unit.source: Authentication SAML request is not valid
trans-unit.target: Authentication SAML request is not valid

trans-unit.source: Authentication SAML response is not valid
trans-unit.target: Authentication SAML response is not valid

trans-unit.source: You can try logging in again in
trans-unit.target: You can try logging in again in

trans-unit.source: Private key and x509cert should be defined
trans-unit.target: Private key and x509cert should be defined

trans-unit.source: LDAP config option groupDn must not be empty
trans-unit.target: LDAP config option groupDn must not be empty

trans-unit.source: LDAP groupAttribute must not be empty
trans-unit.target: LDAP groupAttribute must not be empty

trans-unit.source: LDAP baseDn must not be empty
trans-unit.target: LDAP baseDn must not be empty

trans-unit.source: Failed to send email for password recovery. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Failed to send email for password recovery. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: SAML is not configured for given tenant
trans-unit.target: SAML is not configured for given tenant

trans-unit.source: Password is too short. It should have {{ limit }} characters or more.
trans-unit.target: Password is too short. It should have {{ limit }} characters or more.

trans-unit.source: Password is too long. It should have {{ limit }} characters or less.
trans-unit.target: Password is too long. It should have {{ limit }} characters or less.

trans-unit.source: Password should contains at least one upper-case letter
trans-unit.target: Password should contains at least one upper-case letter

trans-unit.source: Password should contains at least one lower-case letter
trans-unit.target: Password should contains at least one lower-case letter

trans-unit.source: Password should contains at least one number
trans-unit.target: Password should contains at least one number

trans-unit.source: Password should contains at least one special character
trans-unit.target: Password should contains at least one special character

trans-unit.source: Password and password confirmation don't match
trans-unit.target: Password and password confirmation don't match

trans-unit.source: Access all the above information at any time
trans-unit.target: Access all the above information at any time

trans-unit.source: View your Sugar profile which includes first and last name
trans-unit.target: View your Sugar profile which includes first and last name

trans-unit.target: View and update any Sugar data (Accounts, Contacts, Leads, etc.) that you are permitted to access

trans-unit.target: View and manage your Identity and Access Management (IAM) objects

trans-unit.source: Only authorized users can change password
trans-unit.target: Only authorized users can change password

trans-unit.source: Only local users can change password
trans-unit.target: Only local users can change password

trans-unit.source: Please enter your old password and choose a new password.
trans-unit.target: Please enter your old password and choose a new password.

trans-unit.source: New password must be different from previous password
trans-unit.target: New password must be different from previous password

trans-unit.source: Please proceed with caution and only allow access if you are logging into "%client%".
trans-unit.target: Please proceed with caution and only allow access if you are logging into "%client%".

trans-unit.source: Learn about how %client% will handle your Sugar data by reviewing the %termsLink%Terms of Use%endlink% and %privacyLink%Privacy policies%endlink%.
trans-unit.target: Learn about how %client% will handle your Sugar data by reviewing the %termsLink%Terms of Use%endlink% and %privacyLink%Privacy policies%endlink%.
